thread.title: John Abraham thanks Cristiano Ronaldo for signed jersey
thread.title_full: John Abraham thanks Cristiano Ronaldo for signed jersey - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: John Abraham thanks Cristiano Ronaldo for signed jersey
text:
Bollywood actor-producer John Abraham has thanked Portuguese football star Cristiano Ronaldo for sending him a signed Real Madrid jersey.

Cristiano Ronaldo gifts singned jersey to John Abraham. Pics/IANS and Tushar Satam 
Ronaldo presented a football jersey to the 'Welcome Back' star that also had a good luck message for him and his Indian Super League (ISL) football team NorthEast United FC.
John took to Twitter to share the photograph of Ronaldo holding the jersey.
The message written on the jersey read: "To my friend John Abraham. Wish the best to you and to NorthEast united FC".
The 42-year-old actor captioned the image: "Thank you Cristiano!".
